title: Explain Nash equilibrium from Firm A, Firm B table

content.question: The combination where Firm A advertises and Firm B does not advertise is Nash equilibrium because

choices.label: it is best for each firm given what the other firm has chosen
the total industry profits are maximized
Firm A has an incentive to change its strategy and chooses not to advertise
It is the best outcome for Firm B regardless of what firm A does
advertising is always the best strategy for Firm A

content.answer: it is best for each firm given what the other firm has chosen
